actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and Safety.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require the House of Representatives to establish and maintain an effective and comprehensive occupational safety and health program.

summary.text: Amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require each agency of the House of Representatives to establish and maintain an effective and comprehensive occupational safety and health program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require the House of Representatives to establish and maintain an effective and comprehensive occupational safety and health program.
